title: Caesar vs Pompey
description: Key events and personalities in the conflict between Caesar and Pompey.

questions.question: Who vetoed the Senate's discussion of Caesar's command?
What did Marcellus do to humiliate Caesar's Transpadane Gauls?
Pompey compared the idea that Caesar might disobey the Senate's decision to:
options: A son wanting to beat his father with a stick
A slave rebelling against his master
